channel.title: Creating fog in a dungeon [hybrid pvp source]
channel.description: Basically, what I want to do, is upon entering a certain dungeon (via teleporter), fog covers your screen, similar to the snow a lot of people use around christmas time. It still needs to be visible, as it's for a boss fight. It's mainly for ambiance. Any and all help would be appreciated.

item.title: Creating fog in a dungeon [hybrid pvp source]
item.dc:creator: @I_am_Brutal I am Brutal
item.description:
@I_am_Brutal wrote:

Basically, what I want to do, is upon entering a certain dungeon (via teleporter), fog covers your screen, similar to the snow a lot of people use around christmas time. It still needs to be visible, as it’s for a boss fight. It’s mainly for ambiance.
Any and all help would be appreciated.
